sections.text:
![](media/263b27b483b7dd2bd56574fceefef15a.png)

**FCCPS AI Advisory Committee Agenda**

**Date of Meeting**

Friday, February 20, 2026

**Location of Meeting**

FCCPS School Board Office (Multi-Purpose Room)

**Time of Meeting**

8:30-9:30 AM (in-person)

-   Adoption of the Agenda
-   Welcome & Introductions
-   Adoption of the Minutes from the Previous Meeting (Meeting 2 — Feb 6, 2026)
-   Public Comments
-   Review of the School Board Charge
-   School Board Liaison Report
-   Topic/Action Item: Shared Baseline — Ratify/confirm key outputs
    -   Definitions + Assumptions (one-page)
    -   Priority “claims/concerns we must address” list
    -   Draft grade-band structure (confirm working approach / note open items)
-   Topic/Action Item: Values & Principles Focus Block
    -   Acknowledge Risks & Opportunities survey themes (as available)
    -   Draft principle candidates
    -   Converge on 8–12 principles and corresponding tradeoff statements (board-ready direction)
-   Discussion of Future Action Items
    -   Meeting 4 (Mar 6) decision gates + pre-work
    -   Workstream check-ins (what’s needed before next meeting)
    -   Town hall capture plan + inbound community inquiry triage (Communications & Community Input)
-   Adjournment

title: 20260220 FCCPS AI Advisory Committee Mtg 3 Agenda
